post.title: fs : iphone 4 16gb and 32gb factory unlocked from montreal.
post.content: hi guys, i have 2 iphones i purchased yesterday in montreal (full price) no crazy prices here : iphone 4 factory unlocked 16gb : $950 iphone 4 factory unlocked 32gb : $1050 there's no more in montreal in stock. get these babies hot and burn ! payment : cash if we meet, or paypal if you live outside montreal (confirmed address only).
